        public static void updateStatistics(int winner,
                                    int bStones,
                                    int wStones)
        Updates game statistics with values from game
        Parameters:
        winner - number of winning player, 1 = black, 2 = white, 3 = draw
        bStones - final number of white stones on game field
        wStones - final number of black stones on game field
